meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Lynda Weiner Paul Cornbleth Jim Diggins Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #2887.

td.p: Lynda Weiner, a housewife and neighborhood geographer from Daly City, California
Paul Cornbleth, an actuary from Las Vegas, Nevada
Jim Diggins, a legal editor from South Euclid, Ohio (whose 1-day cash winnings total $6,100)

tr.td: BRITISH ROYALTY
WINTER OLYMPIC SITES
TRANSPORTATION
MUSICAL TERMS
HOLIDAYS & OBSERVANCES
"ZERO"
